mapper.select: select a.* from (select row_number() over(order by b.seq desc) AS id, b.* from (select * from game order by seq desc) b ) a where developer=#{developer} and contentType=#{contentType}
select * from game where developer=#{master} and regdate=#{regdate} and contentType=#{contentType}
select max(a.seq) as seq from (select seq from game where developer=#{developer} and contentType=#{contentType}) as a;
select developer, regdate from game where seq=#{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into game(title, developer, content, genre, url, contentType, depth) values(#{title}, #{developer}, #{content}, #{genre}, #{url}, #{contentType}, #{depth})
mapper.update: update game set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, genre=#{genre}, url=#{url}, updatedate=now() where developer=#{Developer} and regdate=#{regdate} and contentType=#{contentType}
update game set visitcnt=visitcnt+1 where developer=#{master} and regdate=#{regdate} and contentType=#{contentType}
mapper.delete: delete from core where register=#{developer} and regdate=#{regdate} and contentType=#{contentType} and depth=1
